mapper.select: select * from board where del = 0 order by bno desc;
mapper.insert: insert into board(bno, btitle, bcontent, id,regdate,breadcnt,bdel,bfilename) values(#{bno},#{btitle},#{bcontent},#{id},curdate(),#{breadcnt},#{bdel},#{bfilename})
mapper.update: update board set btitle = #{btitle} , bcontent=#{bcontent}, bfilename=#{bfilename} ,regdate = curdate() where bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: update board set bdel = 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update board set breadcnt = breadcnt + 1 where bno = #{bno}
